body:
Sorry, I didn't understand you.
Please, post steps to reproduce, the problem itself and the expected result.
Also try updating to 2.0.6 or even master and check if the issue is gone.

yii\base\Module  line 447 runAction function

Yii::$app->controller = $oldController;  // $oldController maybe is null

I still don't understand you, sorry :confused:
If someone got @punkwang idea - please, explain it in other words.

I had similar problem with PageCache. If you do

`$this->renderDynamic('echo Yii::$app->controller->id;');`

and enable PageCache, you'll get:

> Trying to get property of non-object

because PageCache listens for AFTER_SEND event (and at that point `Yii::$app->controller` was set back to `null` already).

However, after reload PageCache works as expected because `Yii::$app->controller` is available at the time when reading from cache :)

![err](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/440902/12357477/6564e4f6-bba8-11e5-8661-389876cae396.png)
@punkwang is what @kidol described the same issue?
@punkwang a simple fix for your case would be to use an absolute route by prepending a slash: `Url::to(['/site/index'])`.
